text: Ki! Tomara ki tomadera byaktigata paramarsera age dana-khayarata agabarate bhaya karacha? Sutaram yakhana tomara kara na, ara allah tomadera prati pherena, takhana namaya kayema karo o yakata adaya karo, ara allah o tamra rasulera ajnapalana karo. Ara tomara ya karacha se-sanbandhe allah cira-oyakiphahala.
